meanings.definition: A list of names or items.
meanings.sent1: I made an alist of all the groceries we need to buy.
meanings.sent2: The teacher asked us to write down an alist of our favorite books.
meanings.sent3: My sister's alist of favorite colors includes pink, purple, and blue.
meanings.sent4: The alist of ingredients for the recipe was longer than I expected.
meanings.sent5: She kept an alist of all the places she wanted to visit in her journal.

meanings.sent1: The tree in our backyard is alisting slightly to the left.
meanings.sent2: The old house had a noticeable alisting porch.
meanings.sent3: The alisting tower looked like it might tip over in the wind.
meanings.sent4: The boat started alisting after the heavy cargo was loaded on one side.
meanings.sent5: The alisting bookshelf made the whole room feel crooked.
